scripts.docker2: docker build -t skyrimbingo -f Dockerfile . && docker build -t skyrimbingo-mon -f Dockerfile-mon . && docker run --rm -itp 3000:3000 -v "${PWD}:/usr/src/app:ro" skyrimbingo-mon
scripts.cfdeploy:repository: AWS_PROFILE=personal aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name bingo-repository --template-file infrastructure/repository.yml --tags stack=bingo
scripts.cfdeploy:vpc: AWS_PROFILE=personal aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name bingo-vpc --template-file infrastructure/vpc.yml --tags stack=bingo
scripts.ecrlogin: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 285209584037.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
